dict.string: She is a Viking warrior of Clan Hofferson of the Hooligan tribe, Her dragon name is Stormfly.
He is Hiccup's Best Friend. (Text Book). His dragon name is Meatlug.
He is a veteran warrior of the Hairy Hooligans Tribe and a long-time friend and adviser of Stoick the Vast. His dragon name is Gronckle.
He is the fraternal twin of Ruffnut and is one of the tertartagonists in the How to Train Your Dragon franchise. His dragon name is Barf and Belch.
She is Hiccup's long-lost mother. Her dragon name is Cloudjumper.
He is a Viking son of the chief, His dragnon name is Toothless.
Night Fury is the fastest, smartest, and rarest of the known species of dragons. He is Hiccup's dragnon
